an1.209-218:1.1: “The foremost of my monk disciples who want to train is Rāhula.
an1.209-218:2.1: … who went forth out of faith is Raṭṭhapāla.
an1.209-218:3.1: … who are the first to pick up a ballot slip is Kuṇḍadhāna.
an1.209-218:4.1: … who are eloquent poets is Vaṅgīsa.
an1.209-218:5.1: … who are impressive all around is Upasena Vaṅgantaputta.
an1.209-218:6.1: … who assign lodgings is Dabba Mallaputta.
an1.209-218:7.1: … who are beloved of the deities is Pilindavaccha.
an1.209-218:8.1: … with swift insight is Bāhiya Dārucīriya.
an1.209-218:9.1: … with brilliant speech is Kassapa the Prince.
an1.209-218:10.1: … who have attained the methods of textual analysis is Mahākoṭṭhita.”
